member.name: ID2D1Mesh.Open
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a pointer to an that is used to populate the mesh. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1Mesh
member.summary: Represents a set of vertices that form a list of triangles.
